column3: Since `netconf` values should override main config settings, you want to load `netconf` before `conf`, I think. See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blame/master/src/util.cpp#L546
> Since netconf values should override main config settings, you want to load netconf before conf, I think\n\nThat's not possible, as conf can specify the network.
Edited: What I said doesn't really make a difference. It's still not possible as you say.
Lack of feedback, and still needs a rebase. Feel free to reopen when it has been.
